name: cmsapp
description: Deploys and configures a variety of cmsapps defined from databag 'apps'

recipes.cmsapp: Loads cmsapp databags and selects recipes to use
recipes.cmsapp::mod_php_apache2: Sets up a deployed PHP cmsapp as a mod_php virtual host in Apache2
recipes.cmsapp::php: Deploys a PHP cmsapp specified in a data bag with the deploy_revision resource
